channel.title: Need help with some PF and no-ip feedback please
channel.description: Ok, me and my friend are makign a RSPS and need to port-foward. I know there is lots of guides on this subject, but, I cannot seem to find one on a Belkin Router. We have already attempted to port foward his IP address. We have put the port 43594 in the column under Inbound Port which looks like [___]-[___] and under Private Port [___]-[___]. We also didn't know if the type is TCP, UDP or both. We also have the question about No-Ip. The IP that we are going to use for our server which is for ex: zoparscape.no-ip.org. We tried portfowarding and it seemed to work so we used that IP and it would not connect. If there is a TUT on this please post a link. We would really like some feedback :).

item.title: Need help with some PF and no-ip feedback please
item.dc:creator: @Chiller Chiller
